# discoverabilityTitle

**Instance Property**

An elaborated title that explains the purpose of the command.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var discoverabilityTitle: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The system uses this property to display information about the command. In iOS, the system displays this title in the discoverability heads-up display (HUD). If this property is `nil`, the HUD displays the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICommand/title] property.

In Mac apps built with Mac Catalyst, the system displays the discoverability title as a tooltip.

## Getting information about the command

- **title**: The command’s title.
- **image**: The command’s image.
- **action**: The selector identifying the action method called after the user selects the command.
- **attributes**: The attributes indicating the style of the command.
- **state**: The state of the command.
